participant_1.name: Harshit
participant_1.personality: Harshit is adventurous and has a strong dislike for certain colors, indicating a preference for more rugged or earthy tones. He is disciplined, as shown by his choice to avoid alcohol.
participant_1.background: i hate the color pink. my father was a construction worker. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i do not drink alcohol. i am a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: John is creative and passionate about music, which reflects his artistic side. He seems laid-back and approachable, given his friendly greeting.
participant_2.background: i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my pet's name is charlie. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza.

content.text: Hey! John here. How are you?
I'm good. I just got off work.
